categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic units

nodes.text: Calm Tree was a clone trooper unit that was part of the Grand Army of the Republic. During the Clone Wars, its members participated in the raid on Nuvo Vindi's laboratory alongside Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker, Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi, Padawan Ahsoka Tano, Clone Captain CT-7567 "Rex," and clone units Snow Wolves and Wildfire.
